item.title: Yet Another day

item.title: Megus & LisandraÂ â€” Otaku on Video
item.description: A theme song for a Russian video project about anime â€œOtaku on videoâ€. Music by Megus Lyrics and vocals by Lisandra Artwork by Lena Hemomo

item.title: Counting Clouds
item.description: Megus played a live show at Voronezh Anime Festival in 2017 and released studio recording of all songs as an album. All songs are covers except for the opening track. Artwork by Anna Petrova

item.title: Selected Chiptune Works
item.description: A compilation of the best music Megus wrote on ZX Spectrum for AY-3-8910(12)/YM-2149F sound chip between 1997 and 2002. Artwork by Alexander â€œPheeLâ€ Filyanov

item.title: Teleidofusion â€” Around Past
item.description: Teleidofusion is a music project by Seajeff and Megus. Their music is a fusion of 8-bit sounds, synthesizers and real instruments. All music by Teleidofusion except â€œFat Cat Wants Tasty Fishâ€ by Alexander â€œManweâ€ Matchugovsky MegusÂ â€” guitars, bass (3, 5, 10), shakuhachi (2), jaw harp (2), vocals (7) SeajeffÂ â€” keyboards, vocals (7) Chris del CaminoÂ â€” alto saxophone (5) Artwork by Sergey “RayNoa” Kostik

item.title: The Rising Sun
item.description: This is the soundtrack for the Japanese visual novel â€œThe Rising Sun: Oceanic Suspense Adventureâ€ by SGP Software. Only the first two tracks were used in the game itself, the other four are remixes made by Megus for the soundtrack CD. â€œLand and Seaâ€ and â€œWinter Roadâ€ are composed by Megus.
